<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Save Shows for Current User"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v1/me/shows"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Save one or more shows to current Spotify user's library.

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **user-library-modify**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ids","description":"A comma-separated list of the Spotify IDs for the shows. **Maximum:** 50 IDs.","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"4oKMMGHSDodd0w4610TjJN,0LoSxo9F59YJwgqFnso315"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
